page.description: Get the value of a substring from the blob.
page.original:
.PEEKC() Syntax Blob_Data as C = .PEEKC( Position as N, Length as N ) ArgumentDescription PositionThe starting position of the data to return. LengthThe number of bytes of data to return.
Description The .PEEKC() method returns a string of the characters starting at Position and going for Length for the blob. The first position is 1. Example dim bb as B bb = "Alpha" ? bb.peekc(2,3) = "lph"
See Also Blob Functions and Methods
